description:
Extend your riding deep into the shoulder seasons with this form-fitting thermal jersey. Stretchy thermal fleece keeps you warm but won't hold you back when it's time to jump out of the saddle.

  • Thermal fleece fabric is made with 4-way stretch for exceptional freedom of movement
  • Full-length zipper for easy venting
  • Silicone print on hem keeps jersey from riding up
  • Three rear drop-in pockets
  • Single zippered back pocket holds your valuables
  • Reflective elemtents
name: Pearl Izumi Attack Thermal Jersey - Women's
